Twister


*Twister follows Sinesis and looks at Plintissa and Dracona*

Twi=
ster: Woah, looks like a battle. Is it a death fight? Or maybe a retreat fi=
ght where the first to retreat loses?

*Twister asks Sinesis*

Twister: I d=
on't think we should interfear or anything and find our own pray. What do y=
ou think?

*Twister says to Sinesis*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 10:09=
 PM
  Subject: Re: NBW


  Sinesis shrugs.

  "Let's just go out scouting."=
 Sinesis says. He posed and put Sinister's sword away. Then he walked out t=
he door and noticed the battle about to take place between Plintissa and Dr=
acona...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: ilovealllizards 
    T=
o: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 9:56 PM
    Subjec=
t: Re: NBW


    Twister


    Twister: Okay, let's ask her. Over Commlink =
or face to face?

    *Twister asks Sinesis*

      ----- Original Message =
----- 
      From: THECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Frida=
y, August 04, 2000 9:37 PM
      Subject: Re: NBW


      "Maybe, how about=
 we ask Dracona?" Sinesis says to Twister...
        ----- Original Message=
 ----- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
    Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 6:02 PM
        Subject: Re: NBW


      =
  Twister

        *Twister smiles as Sinesis shakes her hand*

        Twi=
ster: Do you know of anyone that would like to die?

        *Twister asks =
Sinesis*

          ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
=
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5=
:52 PM
          Subject: Re: NBW


          Sinesis eagerly shakes Twiste=
r's hand.

          "Partners!" Sinesis says...
            ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
            From: ilovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
            Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 5:40 PM
            S=
ubject: Re: NBW


            Twister


            *Twister looks at Sines=
is*

            Twister: It seems that we have something in common and I n=
eed a partner too.

            *Twister extends her hand to Sinesis*

    =
        Twister: Partner?

            *Twister asks Sinesis with her hand =
extended*

              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: =
THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Friday, =
August 04, 2000 4:45 PM
              Subject: Re: NBW


              "Tra=
veling alone, though? What about all the bots we killed together? What abou=
t all of the times we took shots for each other? It's horribly not fair. I =
wish I had a partner still." Sinesis said. He looked closer at Twister.

  =
            "Hey, will you be my partner?" Sinesis askes Twister...
       =
         ----- Original Message ----- 
                From: ilovealllizard=
s 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                Sent: Friday, Au=
gust 04, 2000 4:38 AM
                Subject: Re: NBW


                Tw=
ister/Blizzard/Infectra



                *Twister looks at the sword and =
sighs*

                Twister: I'll have to get used to the fact that, my=
 sister has a life too and I'll have to learn to travel alone....

        =
        *Twister sighs and slowly and gentley places the energon eagles int=
o her arm compartment*


                *Blizzard looks at Sinister and sm=
iles*

                Blizzard: I wonder what's happening back at the base=
.



                *Infectra smiles back at Airbomber*

                I=
nfectra: I trust the both of you......I did trust the others but....

     =
           *Infectra sighs*

                Infectra: I need to stop think=
ing of things that upset me. But, it's hard to thinl of the good times beca=
use there were hardly none.

                *Infectra says to Airbomber an=
d grins*


                  ----- Original Message ----- 
                =
  From: THECODE 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                =
  Sent: Friday, August 04, 2000 4:20 AM
                  Subject: Re: NBW
=


                  Sinesis frowns. He holds up his brothers sword.

      =
            "He left this here, without it, what shall he do? We have simul=
ar problems. I just wish I still had him by my side." Sinesis said to Twist=
er.

                  Sinister held Blizzards hand, illegal fireworks shoo=
ting off in his eyes.

                  Stranato calls out.

             =
     "Hey, any Maximals here?" He yells through the base. Airbomber sits do=
wn and looks to Infectra. He smiles.

                  "Hopefully, the Max=
imals will listen to us, they must know of the occurences happening. I trus=
t Stranato, he's always been good. Well, maybe he hasn't always been good, =
but he's good now." Airbomber said to Infectra. He laughed at his words...
=
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From:=
 ilovealllizards 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
       Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 11:44 PM
                    Subject=
: Re: NBW


                    Twister/Blizzard/Infectra



              =
      *Twister looks at Sinesis*

                    Twister: I've decided=
 to let my sister be...For she's my sister and I love her too much to pull =
her away from the she loves....

                    *Twister opens her arm=
 compartment and pulls out a two small pieces of energon both shaped like a=
n eagle*

                    Twister: Our parents gave us both one to unit=
e us as sisters and friends forever and always help each other. I found Bli=
zzard's on the ground in front of the base. I doubt she dropped it by accid=
ent.....

                    *Twister holds out to Sinesis so he can see*
=



                    (OOC: Ack! I meant The Team Ultima Base! My bad, Sor=
ry.)

                    *Blizzard skips out of the cave and walks next to=
 Sinister for The Team Ultima Base and holds her hand out wanting Sinister =
to hold her hand*



                    *Infectra follows Stranato and Air=
bomber into the Maximal Base*


                      ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
                      From: THECODE 
                      To: nbw=
rpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:59=
 PM
                      Subject: Re: NBW


                      Sinesis =
sighs and stares at Twister. (Sorry about earlier.)

                      =
Sinister frowns when he sees Blizar walking toward the Maximal base.

     =
                 "Where are you going? And can I come?" Sinister asked.

  =
                    Stranato and Airbomber stop at the Maximal base, since =
they were never set on enemy and never betrayed the Maximals, they went on =
in...
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
         From: ilovealllizards 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.=
com 
                        Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:46 PM
      =
                  Subject: Re: NBW


                        Infectra/Wrath=
/Blizzard/Twister


                        *Infectra follows Stranato and =
Airbomber towards the Maximal Base*



                        *Wrath gets =
into a CR Chamber when he arives at the Maximal Base awaits his repairs*


=

                        *Blizzard does a little skip out of the cave walks=
 next to Sinister for the Maximal Base and holds her hand out towards his w=
anting to hold hands with him*



                        (OOC: Twister is =
out near the Maximal Base but I'm making her come back anyway.)

          =
              *Twister leaves the location of the Maximal Base seeing as ho=
w everyone was else where and went back to Team Ultimas Base and sits at th=
e same table as Sinesis*

                        Twister: I don't know wha=
t I'm going to do....I end up here thinking I'll find a nice Team where I'm=
 wanted and me and my sister could be sisters and friends...I was such a fo=
ol for believing such happiness could happen.....

                        =
*Twister puts her double sided sword away stares at the table*


          =
                ----- Original Message ----- 
                          Fro=
m: THECODE 
                          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
             =
             Sent: Thursday, August 03, 2000 6:27 PM
                      =
    Subject: NBW


                          Stranato and Airbomber walked =
toward the Maximal base.

                          Gangon, still dying.

 =
                         Deemos and Inzola confront one another several tim=
es, but Inzola always runs from Deemos.

                          Etchinga=
r called out to Megatron.

                          "Hey, do I got the job=
?" He asked.

                          Time Bomb waited patiently and Land=
 Mine was healed now. Land Mine looked around, looking to meet Megatron.

 =
                         Sinister came out of the cave (Hopefully with Bliz=
zard.) and started back toward Team Ultima's base.

                       =
   Sinesis was healed and sat down next to Twister...





















=
